I have gotten many life like voices over the years. My first evp was my mot=
hers voice and no boxes were involved. The box is=A0a tool/method and there=
 are many ways to get their voices heard. So in the different methods I hav=
e used, yes I have heard voices that resemble their lifetime charachteristi=
cs and tones. Is it always that way? No. 
=A0
Most often the group will=A0s=
peak as one voice because I have requested they do so.=A0One voice tone wil=
l begin a sentence and another will end it. So I may hear my female friends=
 voice start off a thought and an unknown male voice finish the sentence. A=
nd vice versa often they speak in tones which do not even come close to wha=
t they sounded like in life. Quite often they are spirits I didnt know in l=
ife. I may get someone saying This is edison, and then find an old recordin=
g he did where he starts it off saying This is edison, but for me I do not =
know the man so there is no recognition for me. I document it and file it a=
way as a curiousity.
=A0
I always laugh when people say thats not your moth=
er or friend=A0thats something trying to fool you and mess with your head. =
I knew my mother longer than anyone and its interesting that it is easier f=
or those people to believe that its possible that something/someone else is=
 speaking pretending to be my mother but its much harder for them to believ=
e that quite possibly that really is my mother keeping her promise to stay =
in touch after death. If one is possible then so is the other. I tend to be=
=A0stubborn in some respects in that I dont instantly believe what anyone t=
ells me whether living or not. If they give me a message I think is dumb I =
am very reluctant to pass it on and usually those are the ones that get the=
 biggest confirmations tho it means nothing to me at the time. So yes quite=
 possibly evp work can be used the same as mediumship in missing persons ca=
ses.
=A0
For me tone of voice has grown to mean nothing. It is a treat when=
 they manage to come across sounding as they did when in physical form here=
 but I look beyond the tone of voice. Often people get a childs voice and t=
hey become saddened by the thought that a child is earthbound. But I see it=
 just as a representation of voice and whether it comes across as male fema=
le child or robot matters little=A0to me.
=A0
I do find they often resume t=
he "character" they played because after all that is sort of what we are, c=
haracters in some giant play. Whether it is the beliefs they had which were=
 their trademark, the tone of voice, their image, or use of some nickname e=
ven I dont know about I look at it all as just a pixel in a larger portrait=
 that some part survives once the body has ceased to function. And the mess=
age is simply, our energy continues on.
=A0
Quote by Einstein: 'Energy cann=
ot be created or destroyed, it can only be changed from one form to another=
.'
=A0
